profileAlternative.name: Emma(Wenzhe) Ding
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Airbnb
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a full stack Data Scientist skilled in cleaning, interpreting and modeling data in a fast-paced environment. My skills in data science have developed during 3+ years’ experience in my current role as a Data Scientist at Elementum as well as my previous role as an Urban Planner analyzing geospatial location data. Before joining Elementum, I was a research analyst at The National Center of Excellence for Aviation Operations Research (NEXTOR) and has successfully lead research publications.

Competencies: Python, R, SQL, Spark, NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib, Statistics, Predictive Techniques and Machine Learning Algorithms

aboutAlternative.text:
I am a full stack Data Scientist skilled in cleaning, interpreting and modeling data in a fast-paced environment. My skills in data science have developed during 3+ years’ experience in my current role as a Data Scientist at Elementum as well as my previous role as an Urban Planner analyzing geospatial location data. Before joining Elementum, I was a research analyst at The National Center of Excellence for Aviation Operations Research (NEXTOR) and has successfully lead research publications.

Competencies: Python, R, SQL, Spark, NumPy, SciPy, Matplotlib, Statistics, Predictive Techniques and Machine Learning Algorithms

given.text: Wenzhe is extremely bright and creative. She contributed broadly, and the entire team respected her technical capabilities. Wenzhe will be a strong addition to any team looking to scale while managing large data sets and/or transactional volumes.

Emma is one of the smartest data scientists I've ever worked with. Her excellent business acumen, strong back ground in statistics and machine learning along with persuasive direct communication style makes her an avid data scientist. She is a goto person for any adhoc data science research task or an end to end full stack data science project. I like her ability to take complete ownership of any project with result oriented mindset. See less

items: Economic Impact of Lightning Strike-Induced Outage of Air Traffic Control Tower Case Study of Baltimore-Washington International Airport

peopleAlsoViewed.text: Coming Data Scientist at Pinterest in March! Currently enjoying the last semester at UC Berkeley!
